english.segment1: Promises shattered. Answers don't come. Friends say goodbye. Plans come undone. Dreams get crushed. Lies get told. Words can turn cruel. Hearts can grow cold
english.segment2: CHORUS. In a broken world where we cry to feel. Some hope that helps these hearts to heal. You're my strength, You're my refuge. In a broken world, Jesus I'm holding to You
english.segment3: You make sense of the madness. And You make darkness flee. You bring such a calm. To the chaos in me. Show me life. Tell me truth. Day after day I keep running to You
english.segment5: Long ago, we fell so far. Yet You came to where we are
